title: Naqvi pays homage to martyred rangers Inspector Shah Rukh Khan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 17 (APP):Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi has paid homage to Rangers Inspector Shah Rukh Khan, who was martyred in an attack by unknown assailants in Shaheed Benazirabad.
Interior Minister expressed heartfelt condolences to the family of the martyred inspector, and said that Shah Rukh Khan had achieved the highest rank of martyrdom while performing his duties.
He stated that we salute the sacrifice of Shah Rukh Khan.
He said that during this time of grief, nation stands with the martyred inspectorâ€™s family and shares their grief.
